definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Fashion designers have masculinized women's looks in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 现在流行的领子外观有某种我不喜欢的设计。

sentences.english: Let me smooth your collar back, it's sticking out again.
sentences.chinese: 让我把你的领子给你放平，又竖起来了。

sentences.english: She began unfastening the collar of her gown.
sentences.chinese: 她动手解她长袍的领子。

sentences.english: She wore a murrey-coloured gown with a little lace collar .
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件带花边小领子的黑紫色长袍。

sentences.english: The five-pointed star is worn on the collars of Italian military uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 五角星是意大利军队制服领子上的图案。

sentences.english: There is a drop of blood on your collar. What happened?
sentences.chinese: 你的领子上有一滴血。发生了什么事？

sentences.english: There is not much stretch in this collar, I can hardly get it over my head.
sentences.chinese: 这领子没有伸缩性，我穿衣服时头简直穿不进去。

sentences.english: Running the collars and cuffs through the mangle was also Joe's idea.
sentences.chinese: 同热轧滚筒熨领子和袖口也是乔的主意。

sentences.english: The collar of his ragged coat was turned up.
sentences.chinese: 他那破烂上衣的领子向上翻着。

sentences.english: Form-fitting self binding at collar and arms.
sentences.chinese: 合身的领子和武器的自我约束力。
在你的领子上留下唇印。

sentences.english: The collar comes off this shirt and can be washed separately.
sentences.chinese: 这件衬衫的领子可以拿下来分别洗。

sentences.english: Over the latter waved the long whitish beard, drooping almost to the waist.
sentences.chinese: 而领子前还飘着长长的灰白胡子，几乎要垂到腰间了。

sentences.english: Those wrinkle free clothes mostly include formaldehyde, which usually gives the collar shape.
sentences.chinese: 那些防皱的衣服大多都含有使衣服领子很有型的甲醛。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I've singed the collar of your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我把你的衬衫领子烧焦了。

sentences.english: Trousers and collars caught on both sides with black satin fabrics folder.
sentences.chinese: 裤子两侧夹缝有和领子同面料的黑缎夹条。

definition: collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
